    Application scalability on AKS with HorizontalPodAutoscalers - Understand scaler configurations

    »

    1. What does the stabilization window mean?

      The amount of time the HPA will look back to the metrics API to get stable data.

      The cooldown period before scaling up or down again.

      The number of seconds to wait before the HPA can start working.


    2. What are the three values for selectPolicies?

      Average, Disabled, and Max

      Min, Max, and Deactivated

      Min, Max and Disabled


    3. When should you define behavior to your HPA?

      On every created HPA since the key is required.

      When we want to fine-tune the HPA behavior.

      To fine-tune the deployment behavior when scaling.
